faq_content:
Frequently Asked Questions:

Q: How fast is your delivery?
A: We offer delivery in 10-30 minutes for most areas.

Q: What payment methods do you accept?
A: We accept cash on delivery, UPI, credit/debit cards, and digital wallets.

Q: Can I cancel my order?
A: Yes, you can cancel orders before they are confirmed. Contact us immediately.

Q: What if I receive damaged items?
A: We offer full refunds for damaged or incorrect items. Contact us within 24 hours.

Q: Do you deliver to my area?
A: Check your delivery address during checkout to confirm availability.

Q: How can I track my order?
A: Use the tracking number provided in your order confirmation email/SMS.

cookie_policy_content:
Cookie Policy

Last updated: December 2024

üç™ What Are Cookies:
Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us provide a better user experience.

üìä Types of Cookies We Use:

üîê Essential Cookies:
‚Ä¢ Session management and security
‚Ä¢ Shopping cart functionality
‚Ä¢ User authentication
‚Ä¢ These cannot be disabled

üìà Analytics Cookies:
‚Ä¢ Website usage statistics
‚Ä¢ Performance monitoring
‚Ä¢ User behavior analysis
‚Ä¢ Help improve our services

üéØ Marketing Cookies:
‚Ä¢ Personalized recommendations
‚Ä¢ Targeted advertising
‚Ä¢ Social media integration
‚Ä¢ Can be disabled in settings

‚öôÔ∏è Third-Party Cookies:
‚Ä¢ Payment processors (secure)
‚Ä¢ Analytics services (Google Analytics)
‚Ä¢ Social media platforms
‚Ä¢ Delivery tracking services

üîß Managing Cookies:
‚Ä¢ Browser settings control
‚Ä¢ Clear cookies regularly
‚Ä¢ Disable non-essential cookies
‚Ä¢ Mobile app permissions

üì± Mobile App Cookies:
‚Ä¢ Similar functionality to web
‚Ä¢ App-specific storage
‚Ä¢ Device preferences
‚Ä¢ Offline functionality

üõ°Ô∏è Cookie Security:
‚Ä¢ Encrypted transmission
‚Ä¢ Secure storage
‚Ä¢ No personal data in cookies
‚Ä¢ Regular security updates

üìû Your Choices:
‚Ä¢ Accept all cookies
‚Ä¢ Reject non-essential cookies
‚Ä¢ Clear cookies anytime
‚Ä¢ Contact us for concerns
